trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of panels in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class stores the panels displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>类存储中显示的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>。

trans-unit.source: Each object in the collection is an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class which defines the display characteristics and behaviors of a panel displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的每个对象是的一个实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>类该类定义的显示特征和行为的一个面板中显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to add panels to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 有多种方式可将面板添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method provides the ability to add a single panel to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>方法提供的功能添加到集合的一个面板。

trans-unit.source: To add a number of panels to the collection, you create an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects and assign it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将多个面板添加到集合中，你创建的数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对象，并将其分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to insert a panel at a specific location within the collection, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要在集合中的特定位置插入一个面板，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove panels, you can use either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method if you know where the panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除面板，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A>方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法如果你知道面板是位于集合内。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A> method enables you to remove all panels from the collection instead of using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a single panel at a time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A>方法使你能够从而不是使用集合中移除所有面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A>方法一次删除一个面板。

trans-unit.source: In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing panels, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> also provides methods to find panels within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 除了用于添加和删除面板，方法和属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>还提供了查找集合中的面板的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to determine whether a panel is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A>方法使您能够确定面板是否是集合的成员。

trans-unit.source: Once you know that the panel is located within the collection, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine where the panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你知道面板位于集合中，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法来确定面板在集合中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件在窗体上，添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>命名`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: 第二个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>类来显示当前时间。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A>属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>属性来访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>若要添加到面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>属性，以初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对象。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定在此示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control that contains this collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> class.
You cannot create an instance of this class without associating it with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 你无法创建此类的实例，而无需将其与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to the collection.
The text for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that is being added.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified text to the collection.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel that was added to the collection.
You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to display more than one type of information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以添加到面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件来显示多个类型的信息。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the text specified in the `text` parameter and adds it to collection.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>方法创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中指定的文本与`text`参数并将其添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The order in which panels are located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> represents the order that panels are displayed within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 在其中面板位于中的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>表示内显示面板的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从左到右从集合中第一个面板显示面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件不会更改在其中面板中显示的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>。

trans-unit.source: To insert a panel at a specific position in the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在集合中特定位置处插入一个面板，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add a set of panels to the collection in a single operation, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将一组面板添加到单个操作中的集合，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to add to the collection.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to the collection.
The zero-based index of the item in the collection.
You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to display more than one type of information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以添加到面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件来显示多个类型的信息。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> specified in the `value` parameter to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>方法将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中指定`value`到集合的参数。

trans-unit.source: The order in which panels are located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> represents the order that panels are displayed within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 在其中面板位于中的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>表示内显示面板的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从左到右从集合中第一个面板显示面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件不会更改在其中面板中显示的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>。

trans-unit.source: To insert a panel at a specific position in the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在集合中特定位置处插入一个面板，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add a set of panels to the collection in a single operation, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将一组面板添加到单个操作中的集合，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件在窗体上，添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对象。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对象，名为`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: 第二个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>类来显示当前时间。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A>属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>属性来访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>若要添加到面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>属性，以初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>对象。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定在此示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> being added to the collection was <see langword="null" />.
The parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> specified in the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" />.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objects to add.
Adds an array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objects to the collection.
You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to display more than one type of information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以添加到面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件来显示多个类型的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method adds an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects specified in the `panels` parameter to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A>方法添加一个数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中指定的对象`panels`到集合的参数。

trans-unit.source: All existing panels in the collection are removed from the collection before inserting new panels.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的所有现有面板会从集合，然后再插入新的面板。

trans-unit.source: The order in which panels are located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> represents the order that panels are displayed within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 在其中面板位于中的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>表示内显示面板的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从左到右从集合中第一个面板显示面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件不会更改在其中面板中显示的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>。

trans-unit.source: To add a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>到集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To insert a panel at a specific position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control (and in this collection), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在特定位置处插入一个面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件 （并在此集合中），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objects being added to the collection was <see langword="null" />.
Removes all items from the collection.
When you remove panels from the collection, all information about the deleted panels is lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果从集合中移除面板，有关已删除的面板的所有信息都将丢失。

trans-unit.source: To remove a single panel from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除从单个面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to locate in the collection.
Determines whether the specified panel is located within the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if the panel is located within the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to determine whether a panel is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A>方法使您能够确定面板是否是集合的成员。

trans-unit.source: Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine where the panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您知道项位于集合内，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法来确定面板在集合中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to find in the collection.
Determines whether the collection contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate the collection contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A>属性对应的密钥<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 键比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.ContainsKey%2A> returns `false.`
trans-unit.target: 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.ContainsKey%2A>返回 `false.`

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> 对象的数目。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the number of panels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您能够确定中的面板数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>。

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value when you are looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop.
trans-unit.target: 然后，将循环访问集合的值和你需要提供要执行循环的迭代次数时，可以使用此值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator to use to iterate through the item collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that represents the item collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to locate in the collection.
Returns the index within the collection of the specified panel.
The zero-based index where the panel is located within the collection; otherwise, negative one (-1).
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> method enables you to determine where a panel is located within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法使您能够确定其中一个面板是位于集合内。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether an item is located within the collection before calling this method, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定某个项是否位于集合，然后再调用此方法，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Contains%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to find in the collection.
Returns the index of the first occurrence of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key, if found; otherwise, -1.

If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOfKey%2A>连续，最后调用返回索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，如果没有匹配项，从集合的开头开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A>属性对应的密钥<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 键比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOfKey%2A>返回-1。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location where the panel is inserted.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> representing the panel to insert.
Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> into the collection at the specified index.
You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to display more than one type of information.
trans-unit.target: 您可以添加到面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件来显示多个类型的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A> method enables you to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and insert it at a specific location within the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Insert%2A>方法使您能够创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>并将其插入集合中的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: The order in which panels are located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> represents the order that panels are displayed within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 在其中面板位于中的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>表示内显示面板的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从左到右从集合中第一个面板显示面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控件不会更改在其中面板中显示的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>。

trans-unit.source: To add a panel to the end of the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将面板添加到集合的末尾，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add a set of panels to the collection in a single operation, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将一组面板添加到单个操作中的集合，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="value" /> parameter's parent is not <see langword="null" />.

The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> class.

The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize" /> property of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter's panel is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize" /> value.
Gets a value indicating whether this collection is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> if this collection is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果此集合是只读的;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is always `false` for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终是`false`为此集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an item within the collection.
The index of the panel in the collection to get or set.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> at the specified index.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> representing the panel located at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />表示面板位于集合中的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> stored at a specific location within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法以获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>存储在集合中的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a specific panel within the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定集合中的特定面板的索引，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> assigned to the collection was <see langword="null" />.
The name of the item to retrieve from the collection.
Gets an item with the specified key from the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定键的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A>属性对应的密钥<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 键比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Item%2A> returns `null.`
trans-unit.target: 如果`key`参数是`null`或空字符串，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Item%2A>返回 `null.`

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> representing the panel to remove from the collection.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> from the collection.
When you remove a panel from the list, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当从列表中删除一个面板时，索引更改集合中的后续项。

trans-unit.source: All information about the removed panel is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 删除有关已删除的面板的所有信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to remove a specific panel from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> by specifying the actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法删除从的特定面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>通过指定的实际<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>若要从集合中移除。

trans-unit.source: To specify the index of the panel to remove instead of the panel itself, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要移除而不是本身的面板的面板的索引，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove all panels from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中移除所有面板，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> assigned to the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The zero-based index of the item to remove.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> located at the specified index within the collection.
When you remove a panel from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent panels in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除一个面板，当索引更改集合中的后续面板。

trans-unit.source: All information about the removed panel is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 删除有关已删除的面板的所有信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to remove a specific panel from the list by specifying the index of the panel to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于从列表中删除的特定面板，通过指定要从集合中移除的面板的索引。

trans-unit.source: To specify the panel to remove instead of the index to the panel, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要移除而不是到面板索引的面板，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To remove all panels from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除从所有面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> class.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to remove from the collection.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> with the specified key from the collection.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A>属性对应的密钥<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The key comparison is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 键比较不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
Copies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
<paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-
The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> is greater than the available space from index to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
The type in the collection cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
The object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to add to the collection.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to the collection.
<paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
-or-
The parent of value is not <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to locate in the collection.
Determines whether the specified panel is located within the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if panel is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> located within the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to locate in the collection.
Returns the index of the specified panel within the collection.
The zero-based index of panel, if found, within the entire collection; otherwise, -1.
The zero-based index location where the panel is inserted.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to insert.
Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> into the collection at the specified index.
The index parameter is less than zero or greater than the value of the <see langword="Count" /> property.
<paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
-or-
The parent of value is not <see langword="null" />.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to remove from the collection.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> from the collection.
